EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Organization Transformation_Q415.
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow for our webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We're excited for you to join us for our webinar Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Organization Transformation tomorrow, December 15, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, December 15, 2015 Time: 10AM PST- 1:00PM EST Click here to join the session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1075104/66BC9B414AB6694857D7B7177CD31B1A]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
See you tomorrow! The Pivotal Team
